name: Lesser Lunarchidna
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lunarchidna makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Light Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in bright light, the lunarchidna has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Stealth
special_abilities.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the lunarchidna can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The lunarchidna can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
